name: AI Hunter
description:
Description:
    Try to stay alive as long as possible while the AI/Enemy is hunting for you

Controls:
    -  You can move the player with your mouse
    -  Press enter to use an power-up
    -  In the main menu you have to press enter to play

PowerUp:
    GhostMode - Then enemy will stop following you when active (You can still take damage)

DevLog:
    V1.1:         -  Added Audio
        -  Added an Menu
        -  Some minor bug fixes to keep you happy ;)
    V1.0 / B0.8: Official Initial Release
    B0.1 : Initial Beta Release
